Interface ClientModelObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
GalaxyTruckerGUI, TUI
public interface ClientModelObserver
The ClientModelObserver interface is designed to observe the state changes in a client-side game model and to update the view or perform actions based on the changes in the game state. It acts as a listener for updates from the game model and provides methods to handle various aspects of the game's state and events.

  • Method Details

    • updateGame

      void updateGame(ClientModel model)
      Updates the entire game state with the provided client model.
      Parameters:
      model - the current state of the client model

    • updateStopHourglass

      void updateStopHourglass()
      Updates the view/state to reflect that the hourglass has stopped.

    • updateStartHourglass

      void updateStartHourglass(int hourglassSpot)
      Starts the hourglass animation or timer at the specified spot.
      Parameters:
      hourglassSpot - the position/index of the hourglass to start

    • updateGamePhase

      void updateGamePhase(GamePhase gamePhase)
      Updates the current phase of the game.
      Parameters:
      gamePhase - the current phase of the game

    • updateBank

      void updateBank(Bank bank)
      Updates the bank state.
      Parameters:
      bank - the current state of the bank

    • updateCoveredComponentTiles

      void updateCoveredComponentTiles(List<ComponentTile> coveredComponentTiles)
      Updates the list of covered component tiles.
      Parameters:
      coveredComponentTiles - list of component tiles that are still covered

    • updateUncoveredComponentTiles

      void updateUncoveredComponentTiles(List<ComponentTile> uncoveredComponentTiles)
      Updates the list of uncovered component tiles.
      Parameters:
      uncoveredComponentTiles - list of component tiles that are uncovered and available

    • updateShipboards

      void updateShipboards(Map<String,Shipboard> shipboards)
      Updates all players' shipboards.
      Parameters:
      shipboards - map associating player nicknames to their shipboards

    • updateFlightboard

      void updateFlightboard(Flightboard flightboard)
      Updates the flightboard state.
      Parameters:
      flightboard - the current flightboard

    • updateShipboard

      void updateShipboard(Shipboard shipboard)
      Updates a single shipboard's state.
      Parameters:
      shipboard - the shipboard to update

    • updateDeck

      void updateDeck(List<AdventureCard> deck)
      Updates the deck of adventure cards.
      Parameters:
      deck - the current list of adventure cards in the deck

    • updateCurrPlayer

      void updateCurrPlayer(String player)
      Updates the current player in the game.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the current player

    • updateCurrCard

      void updateCurrCard(AdventureCard currCard)
      Updates the current adventure card in play.
      Parameters:
      currCard - the current adventure card

    • updateDices

      void updateDices(Dices dices)
      Updates the dice state.
      Parameters:
      dices - the current dices state

    • updateGameStartMessageReceived

      void updateGameStartMessageReceived(boolean gameStartMessageReceived)
      Updates whether the game start message has been received.
      Parameters:
      gameStartMessageReceived - true if the message has been received, false otherwise

    • updateTileInHand

      void updateTileInHand(String player, ComponentTile ct)
      Updates the component tile currently held in hand by a specific player.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player holding the tile
      ct - the component tile in the player's hand

    • updateAllLeaderboard

      void updateAllLeaderboard(Map<String,Integer> leaderboard)
      Updates the entire leaderboard.
      Parameters:
      leaderboard - map associating player nicknames to their scores or rankings

    • updateAllGameLoaded

      void updateAllGameLoaded(ClientModel clientModel)
      Updates the game state when all game data has been loaded.
      Parameters:
      clientModel - the client model containing the full loaded game state
